Articles.Content:
how do you get to the part.cfg. I am a nooby and dont know how to change my controls for these guns.

You know what, I give you this link to another better and more complete but still simple to use weapon mod

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-0-25-BDArmory-v0-7-1-1-Dev-Thread-Dec-9

and let this one rest in peace.

I miss this, my first good weapon in KSP.

Rest in the blood of slain krakens my old friend.
Please, no, I think this was necroed! Mods? Can you deal with this issue?

Given how the last update to this mod was over a year ago and the last discussion of it is pretty dated itself, I think it's safe to say that this mod is no longer being actively developed. Therefore, we'll be closing this thread, unless DYJ lets us know he's ready to resume development.

Have a nice day
